mapper.sql: id, pid, img_url, price,default_img, simplename, description, num, user_id, card_id, category_id, code, pcode, is_deleted, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, flag1, flag2
mapper.select: SELECT m1.id, m1.pid, m1.img_url imgUrl, m1.default_img defaultImg, m1.price price, m1.simplename, m1.description, m1.card_id cardId, m1.user_id userId, m1.create_time createTime, m1.create_by createBy, m1.update_time updateTime, m1.update_by updateBy, m1.flag1, m1.flag2 FROM wx_material m1 WHERE m1.is_deleted = 0 AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 DAY) <= date(m1.create_time) AND m1.card_id = #{cardId} ORDER BY m1.id DESC
